topic.title: A little joke
topic.body:
At an international forum,I posted:"I am very happy. I live in the most powerful country in the world in the prevention and control of CV-19!"
Later, a lot of slanders came, such as "CHlNK" and "ching chong" and someone asked me about human rights in Xinjiang.
After a while I said, "I'm an American, and I'm very interested now. Which country do you think is the most powerful country in the world to prevent and control CV-19?"

topic.title: Whats your view on "Room N" in South Korea?
topic.body: According to a Korean media report, in the morning of the 26th local time, Zhao Zhubin, the main criminal of the sexual exploitation case in the chat room "N" in South Korea, was summoned as a suspect for the first time for investigation.
